entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as the one who told Harry not to beat himself up.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the Seeker and the one who fell on the field.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is mentioned as shutting the door behind the team.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as moving nearer to Harry's bed and talking about Dumbledore.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as saying that Dumbledore was really angry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as being furious and running onto the field to help Harry.

entities.name: the team
entities.description: The team is mentioned as trooping out of the room.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are mentioned as being chased away by Dumbledore's magic.

relationships.description: Dumbledore helped Harry by slowing him down with his wand and then magicking him onto a stretcher.
Dumbledore defeated the dementors by shooting silver stuff at them.
